name: Senior React Native Developer
description:
About Us

We are a fast-growing funded startup building an AI trusted advisor for your life’s biggest financial decision, starting with buying a home.

About The Role

We are looking for a strong, senior react native developer, with a passion for UX and creating a delightful user experience.

A candidate that is entrepreneurial-minded and has an owner mentality, can do things based on KPI and make magic happen.

It's a full-time and fully remote position.

What you will do

  • Oversee all aspects of app development and managing our production mobile apps (Already +50K live users in production, IOS and Android)

  • Create the architecture for our apps to support the scale of the team and code reusability between our web and different apps.

  • Bring the next generation of mobile developers to our company.

  • Build pixel-perfect, buttery smooth UIs across both mobile platforms.

  • Diagnose and fix bugs and performance bottlenecks for performance that feels native.

What you will need.

  • 5+ years of development experience

  • Fluent English

  • Have experience bringing a react-native app to production.

  • Firm knowledge of the JavaScript and TypeScript language and its nuances, including ES6+ syntax

  • Knowledge of Swift/Java programming

  • Ability to write well-documented, clean typescript code

  • Rock-solid at working with third-party dependencies and debugging dependency conflicts

  • Familiarity with native build tools, like XCode, Gradle
